trans-unit.source: Represents a selectable <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> that can contain text and images.
trans-unit.target: 表示包含文本和图像的可选的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" />。

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton> to create a toolbar button that supports both text and images.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton>创建支持文本和图像的工具栏按钮。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageAlign%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.TextAlign%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> properties to get or set the positioning of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton> images and text.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageAlign%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.TextAlign%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性，以获取或设置的定位<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton>图像和文本。

trans-unit.source: You can display a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton> with various border styles, and you can use it to represent and activate operational states.
trans-unit.target: 可以显示<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton>具有各种边框样式，并且你可以使用它来表示和激活的操作状态。

trans-unit.source: You can also define it to have the focus by default.
trans-unit.target: 你还可以定义其默认情况下具有焦点。

trans-unit.source: Although <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton> replaces and extends the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton> control of previous versions, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton> is retained for both backward compatibility and future use.
trans-unit.target: 尽管<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton>替换并扩展<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton>的早期版本中，控件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton>以备向后兼容性和将来使用保留。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows two <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton> controls with both image and text on a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例显示了两个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton>上的控件使用图像和文本<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>。

trans-unit.source: Clicking the **New**<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton> displays a message box.
trans-unit.target: 单击**新建**<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton>显示一个消息框。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The image to display on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton" />.
trans-unit.target: 要在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton" /> 上显示的图像。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton" /> class that displays the specified image.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton" /> 类的新实例，使之显示指定的图像。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton> that displays only an image on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton>.
trans-unit.target: 使用此构造函数创建<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton>上显示只显示图像<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton>。

trans-unit.source: The text to display on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton" />.
trans-unit.target: 要在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton" /> 上显示的文本。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton" /> class that displays the specified text.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton" /> 类的新实例，使之显示指定的文本。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton> that displays only text on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton>.
trans-unit.target: 使用此构造函数创建<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton>上显示纯文本<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton>。

trans-unit.source: The text to display on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton" />.
trans-unit.target: 要在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton" /> 上显示的文本。

trans-unit.source: The image to display on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton" />.
trans-unit.target: 要在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton" /> 上显示的图像。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton" /> class that displays the specified text and image.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton" /> 类的新实例，使之显示指定的文本和图像。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton> that displays both an image and text.
trans-unit.target: 使用此构造函数创建<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton>显示的图像和文本。

trans-unit.source: The text to display on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton" />.
trans-unit.target: 要在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton" /> 上显示的文本。

trans-unit.source: The image to display on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton" />.
trans-unit.target: 要在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton" /> 上显示的图像。

trans-unit.source: An event handler that raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Click" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引发 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Click" /> 事件的事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton" /> class that displays the specified text and image and that raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Click" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton" /> 类的新实例，使之显示指定的文本和图像并引发 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Click" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton> that displays both an image and text and raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Click> event when clicked.
trans-unit.target: 使用此构造函数创建<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton>显示图像和文本和引发<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Click>单击时的事件。

trans-unit.source: The text to display on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton" />.
trans-unit.target: 要在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton" /> 上显示的文本。

trans-unit.source: The image to display on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton" />.
trans-unit.target: 要在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton" /> 上显示的图像。

trans-unit.source: An event handler that raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Click" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引发 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Click" /> 事件的事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: The name of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton" /> 的名称。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton" /> class with the specified name that displays the specified text and image and that raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Click" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的名称初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton" /> 类的新实例，使之显示指定的文本和图像并引发 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Click" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton> with the specified name that displays both an image and text and raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Click> event when clicked.
trans-unit.target: 使用此构造函数创建<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton>具有指定名称，以显示图像和文本及引发<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Click>单击时的事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether default or custom <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip" /> text is displayed on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip" /> 上显示的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton" /> 是默认文本还是自定义文本。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if default <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip" /> text is displayed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果显示的是默认 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip" /> 文本，则为 <see langword="true" />，否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton.AutoToolTip%2A> property to `false` to display custom <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ToolTipText%2A> on a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>.
trans-unit.target: 设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton.AutoToolTip%2A>属性`false`显示自定义<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ToolTipText%2A>上<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example turns off the automatic <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> text for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton> and sets custom <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ToolTipText%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例将关闭自动<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>文本<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton>和设置自定义<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ToolTipText%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton" /> can be selected.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton" /> 是否可选。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton" /> can be selected; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 如果<see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton" />可选定; 否则为<see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton" /> is pressed or not pressed.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否已按下 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton" /> is pressed in or not pressed in; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton" /> 已按下，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The following code example sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton.CheckOnClick%2A> property to `true` and uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton.Checked%2A> property in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton.CheckedChanged> event to change the font of the button text to bold when the button is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton.CheckOnClick%2A>属性`true`并使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton.Checked%2A>中的属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton.CheckedChanged>更改按钮文本的字体为加粗时单击该按钮的事件。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton.Checked" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 当 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton.Checked" /> 属性的值更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton.CheckOnClick%2A> property to `true` and uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton.Checked%2A> property in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton.CheckedChanged> event to change the font of the button text to bold when the button is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton.CheckOnClick%2A>属性`true`并使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton.Checked%2A>中的属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton.CheckedChanged>更改按钮文本的字体为加粗时单击该按钮的事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton" /> should automatically appear pressed in and not pressed in when clicked.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示在单击 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton" /> 时该按钮是否应自动显示为按下或未按下状态。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton" /> should automatically appear pressed in and not pressed in when clicked; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果在单击 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton" /> 时该按钮应自动显示为按下或未按下状态，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The following code example sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton.CheckOnClick%2A> property to `true` and uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton.Checked%2A> property in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton.CheckedChanged> event to change the font of the button text to bold when the button is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton.CheckOnClick%2A>属性`true`并使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton.Checked%2A>中的属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton.CheckedChanged>更改按钮文本的字体为加粗时单击该按钮的事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton" /> is in the pressed or not pressed state by default, or is in an indeterminate state.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton" /> 是处于按下状态、未按下状态（默认值）还是不确定状态。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="Unchecked" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="Unchecked" />。

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton.CheckState%2A> to `Indeterminate` when you do not want to set a default state.
trans-unit.target: 设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton.CheckState%2A>到`Indeterminate`不要设置的默认状态。

trans-unit.source: The value assigned is not one of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 分配的值不是 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton.CheckState" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 当 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton.CheckState" /> 属性的值更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton.CheckStateChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton.CheckStateChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>与<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或追加到一个多行消息<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton> named `ToolStripButton1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton>名为`ToolStripButton1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton.CheckStateChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 然后，确保与事件处理程序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton.CheckStateChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new accessibility object for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton" />.
trans-unit.target: 为 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton" /> 创建一个新的辅助功能对象。

trans-unit.source: A new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject" /> for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject" /> 的新 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton" />。

trans-unit.source: If you do not explicitly call <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton.CreateAccessibilityInstance%2A>, it will be called when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.AccessibilityObject%2A> property is referenced.
trans-unit.target: 如果不显式调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton.CreateAccessibilityInstance%2A>，它时将会调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.AccessibilityObject%2A>引用属性。

trans-unit.source: To get or set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.AccessibilityObject%2A> property, you must add a reference to the `Accessibility` assembly installed with the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: 要获取或设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.AccessibilityObject%2A>属性，必须添加对引用`Accessibility`随.NET Framework 一起安装的程序集。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether to display the ToolTip that is defined as the default.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否显示定义为默认值的工具提示。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: 在所有情况下均为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: The specified area for a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton" /> 的指定区域。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the size of a rectangular area into which a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton" /> can be fitted.
trans-unit.target: 检索适合 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton" /> 的矩形区域的大小。

trans-unit.source: An ordered pair of type <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> representing the width and height of a rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 类型为 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> 的有序对，表示矩形的宽度和高度。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件数据的 <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" />。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton.CheckedChanged" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引发 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton.CheckedChanged" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton.OnCheckedChanged%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton.OnCheckedChanged%2A> 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton.OnCheckedChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton.OnCheckedChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 在派生类中重写 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton.OnCheckedChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> 时，一定要调用基类的 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton.OnCheckedChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件数据的 <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" />。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton.CheckStateChanged" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引发 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton.CheckStateChanged" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton.OnCheckStateChanged%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton.OnCheckStateChanged%2A> 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton.OnCheckStateChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton.OnCheckStateChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 在派生类中重写 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton.OnCheckStateChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> 时，一定要调用基类的 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton.OnCheckStateChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件数据的 <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" />。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引发 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton.OnClick%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton.OnClick%2A> 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton.OnClick(System.EventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton.OnClick(System.EventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 在派生类中重写 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton.OnClick(System.EventArgs)" /> 时，一定要调用基类的 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton.OnClick(System.EventArgs)" /> 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件数据的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs" />。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引发 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton.OnPaint%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton.OnPaint%2A> 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton.OnPaint(System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton.OnPaint(System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 在派生类中重写 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton.OnPaint(System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs)" /> 时，一定要调用基类的 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton.OnPaint(System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs)" /> 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。
